projects.title: FLAD - Facebook Livestream Auto Deal
projects.description: A graduation thesis project that automates order processing during Facebook livestreams, enhancing sales efficiency. Built with VueJs, NodeJs, Postgres, Docker, Kubernetes, GKE, and Facebook API.

projects.title: TVN Ecommerce
projects.description: An e-commerce platform similar to Shopify with custom functionalities for sales teams. Built with Vue, Nuxt.js, GraphQL, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: Hotel Manager
projects.description: A web application for hotel room booking and management. Built with HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, PHP, and MySQL.
